text: sahēādaranmār paṟaññu: "avan kaṭṭuveṅkil avanṟe sahēādaranuṁ mump kaṭṭiṭṭuṇṭ.” yūsuph iteākke tanṟe manas'sileāḷippiccuveccu. yāthārthyaṁ avarēāṭ veḷippeṭuttiyilla. addēhaṁ itramātraṁ paṟaññu: "niṅṅaḷuṭe nilapāṭ nanne mēāśantanne. niṅṅaḷ paṟaññuṇṭākkunnatineppaṟṟiyeākke nannāyaṟiyāvunnavanāṇ allāhu.”
